name: ventilation components factory construction | ventilation components factory | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2174/documentation

This infrastructure module represents an approximation for the infrastructure of an company producing metal parts an components for ventilation systems. Due to the approximation with data of only few companies this inventory has a high uncertainty.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Process for building and production machine includes construction and disposal processes. Land use for plant included.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data for production in western Europe used.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Building halls in steel construction for 70% of  the built up area and 10 m high multi-storey buildings for 30% of the built up area of 50000 m2 assumed. The life time of the tanks was assumed to be 50 years. The production machines have an assumed life time of 25 years. The yearly production is 5000 t/a. Land use derived from environmental reports of different similar companies.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Approximation with data from environmental reports and information of similar companies.
